1.1: Hey,My name is Deadeye and I am going to guide you to play the game
1.2: You can use arrow keys or A/D keys to move
1.3: Space/Up Arrow key is for jump
1.4: And C for throwing ninja blade to kill those bad guys
1.5: You can even double jump by pressing jump key again

3.1: This level might not be easy one
3.2: Zombies are looking for you.Don't forget your goal
